column4: Hi, I installed Gbrainy (some gnome brain trainer software) on my (English) ubuntu Hardy installation. Now I downloaded a German .po translation file - unfortunately, it comes without instructions. Where do I put it?
maybe u can try find on .Gbrainy folder on your home folder
unfortunately not. I fear it's a module that needs to be used when compiling the programme. bad thing: I didn't compile it, I'm a repo monkey :)
